channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [PIG-2109] Ant build continues even if the parser classes fail to be generated.
item.description:
Ant build continues even if the parser classes fail to be generated. Please check the following build log:

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 29 seconds
'''

It may cause developers overlooking the errors of generating parser classes. The reasonable behavior is terminating the build when the errors are encountered.
item.summary: Ant build continues even if the parser classes fail to be generated.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
